entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as the one who seized Marietta and began shaking her. She is also referred to by her title 'Miss Edgecombe'.

entities.name: edgecombe
entities.description: Miss Edgecombe is mentioned as the one who told Potter about the meeting in the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as the leader of the meeting and the one who organized it.

entities.name: marietta
entities.description: Marietta is mentioned as the student who was seized by Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is mentioned as the one who responded coldly to Professor Umbridge's accusations.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is mentioned as the one who started forward and told Professor Umbridge to calm herself.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who stood up for Marietta and told Professor Umbridge not to manhandle his students.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge seized Marietta and began shaking her very hard.
Dumbledore stood up for Marietta and told Professor Umbridge not to manhandle his students.
